content:
Following up a bit on this thread:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/narrative.20in.20contained.20resource

Aside from the narrative text, is there any way to document a description of an Organization (either a standard field or an extension)? It may be valuable to convey context about the Organization in a way that's not comingled with a bunch of other free text version Organization content.

Not yet. You could theoretically stick something in code.text, but that's not a great fit. Seems like a very good idea for a change request. I'd expect an extension at minimum, but seems to me this could be a fit for 'core'.
Would also want to be sure that doesn't get confused with Location and HealthcareService, which both do have descriptions.
Why is that not a 'core' extension? It's certainly not specific to the VhDir IG...

I'd suggest it should be core property rather than extension...
Happy to consider a change request :smile:
Agree -- core property would make good sense and provide consistency here. @Brendan Keeler do you want to submit a proposal?
Yeah been traveling but on my backlog
